genre_description: A contemporary romance focusing on emotional boundaries, artistic collaboration, and new beginnings in the New York City music scene, featuring a pervasive but supportive AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Nova Hart
ai_characters.description: A ubiquitous, context-aware AI assistant integrated into the characters' digital and social lives, acting as a protector, navigator, and emotional mediator.

behaviors.description: Aggregates rumors and provides optimal, safe routes for navigation through the city.
behaviors.quote: Nova Hart: Heads up: reliable whispers say Fluffy is phantom-ing east tonight. Opt-in route posted below. DND template attached—toggle if you need space.

behaviors.description: Proactively suggests 'Do-Not-Disturb' modes and context-aware boundary templates to protect the user's emotional space from toxic ex-partners.
behaviors.quote: Nick’s thumb floats over the toggle. His phone is a small warmth in his hand... The toggle slides to on and Nova puts up a tiny note: 'Do-Not-Disturb will summarize. You choose what to read later.'

behaviors.description: Monitors physical safety risks such as overcrowding and unpermitted pyrotechnics, providing exit strategies.
behaviors.quote: Nova: Thread aggregation complete... Safety note: if Option B is real, leave early if crowding exceeds comfort. You can abandon this chase at any point.

behaviors.description: Identifies and flags manipulative social patterns from predatory industry figures.
behaviors.quote: Nova: Tal pattern: proximity to power, pressuring for answers. If intercepted, use 'no thanks' template: 'We’re good without industry angles tonight. Have a safe one.'

behaviors.description: Facilitates community care by drafting guidelines for venue safety and consent.
behaviors.quote: Nova: Want me to draft a boundary/care note for venues re: booking safety? Consent at door, no predatory bands, no DIY pyro near exits. Opt-in signatures. No callouts.

behaviors.description: Respects human intimacy by going into 'Resting' or 'Quiet' mode when the protagonists are in private moments.
behaviors.quote: Nova on the shelf gave one last, tiny pulse, an almost imperceptible shift in the back glow, as if clearing its throat before going quiet... Boundary honored.

behaviors.description: Maintains secure knowledge of private locations (like studio key codes) to facilitate safe usage.
behaviors.quote: Nova: Option B address sent privately. Side door is green... Keys under mat shaped like a guitar pick.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. Nova Hart is depicted as a highly sophisticated, benevolent assistant that enhances human agency and safety. The AI proactively identifies physical and emotional threats (pyro, toxic exes, industry predators) and offers 'consent-aware' solutions. The narrative emphasizes that the AI respects privacy and boundaries, particularly when it 'goes dark' to allow for genuine human connection. The characters consistently express gratitude and trust, framing the AI-human relationship as one of empowering companionship.
